definition[0]: to write something down, especially in order to keep a record
example[0]: Mark down everything you eat on your daily chart.
example[1]: The teacher marked him down as absent.
definition[1]: to reduce the price of something
example[2]: Winter coats have been marked down from $80 to $50.
definition[2]: to give a student a lower result in a test, paper etc because they have made mistakes
example[3]: Students will be marked down for failing to follow directions.
